ComicInfo.Title: Deadpool 2099 Chapter One
ComicInfo.Summary:
INTRODUCING: DEADPOOL 2099!
Jump 84 years into the future for an all-new adventure with an all-new Deadpool!
Who is this sci-fi Mouthy-Merc-Lady?
And what's her connection to Wade Wilson?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Scott Koblish & Guru-eFX | 1 | Var | #SecretComic Variant Cover | Gerry Duggan (w), Scott Koblish (a), Guru-eFX (c) & Joe Sabino (l) | 3 | 2nd | Second Printing Cover | Scott Koblish & Guru-eFX | 2 |
